thread.title: Credibly Named to Crain’s New York Business 2015 "Fast 50" List
thread.title_full: Credibly Named to Crain’s New York Business 2015 "Fast 50" List

author: admin
title: Credibly Named to Crain’s New York Business 2015 "Fast 50" List
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/12/2015 @ 6:01 AM   Credibly 
NEW YORK -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Today, Credibly , an emerging Fintech platform that provides a wide range of capital solutions to satisfy the entire credit spectrum of small and medium-sized businesses, ranked No.21 on Crain’s New York Business “2015 Fast 50” list. This marks Credibly’s first appearance on the Fast 50, which recognizes New York City’s fastest-growing and most innovative companies. 
“We’re extremely honored to be recognized by Crain’s New York Business as a ‘Fast 50’ company,” said Credibly CEO Glenn Goldman. “This milestone validates our team's hard work and commitment to fueling small and medium-sized business growth in the U.S. with tailored capital solutions.” 
To date, Credibly has provided nearly $200 million in funding to more than 4,500 businesses in over 300 industries. In the last year alone, the company has grown its revenue 100%, opened offices in three states, and doubled the number of its employees to 120. 
About Credibly 
Credibly is an emerging Fintech platform that leverages data science and analytics to improve the speed, cost, and choice of capital available to all small businesses. With offices in New York, Michigan, Arizona, and Massachusetts, Credibly is dedicated to creating a superior lending experience that meets the needs of all small and medium-sized businesses, regardless of product need or credit profile. To learn more, visit www.credibly.com . View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20151012005548/en/ Copyright © Business Wire 2015
